publicwhip.spmotion: * S2M-2549.3 Carolyn Leckie:NHS Dentistry—As an amendment to motion (S2M-2549) in the name of Shona Robison, leave out from “meet this pledge” to end and insert “improve the health of Scotland’s people and to safeguard the future of NHS dentistry there should be a legal obligation on NHS boards to provide NHS dental services which are accessible by local communities and the Scottish Executive must provide incentives for dentists to undertake more preventive work including a significant increase in the fee level for oral health assessments, assist dentists more with infrastructure costs in return for greater NHS commitment, reduce bureaucracy and simplify the current fee scale and expand the number of NHS salaried dentists on negotiated terms and conditions and the provision of core children’s dental services through revitalised and expanded community dental services and address dental workforce shortages by increasing the number of dental undergraduates and expanding the role and number of professionals complementary to dentistry by ensuring adequate funding to remunerate all staff engaged in the delivery of dental services.”
